snippet.title: Alone In The Dark | Collector's Edition Trailer
snippet.description:
To really immerse yourself in the world of Alone in the Dark, make sure to get your hands on one of the 5000 Collector's Editions available worldwide! 

The Alone in the Dark Collector's Edition includes:
• The Dark Man -Statue 26cm / 10in height
• Game on PS5, Xbox Series X, or PC
• Alone in the Dark Steelbook
• Ostadte - Miniature 10cm/ 4in height
• Collector's Edition DLC Package (Derceto 1992 Costume Pack, Director's Commentary Mode, Vintage Horror Filter Pack)
• Do Not Disturb - Doorhang
• Derceto 1030 Wallsticker Set

Download the Prologue and Pre-Order Alone in the Dark here: aloneinthedark.com

- Pre-Order on Amazon - 
US PlayStation 5: https://thqn.net/3rVDKy5
US Xbox Series: https://thqn.net/3YkSaUg
UK PC: https://thqn.net/3rZdcf3
UK PlayStation 5: https://thqn.net/3Qn2Ksc
UK Xbox Series: https://thqn.net/44I8gtH
DE PC: https://thqn.net/43Xxm6t
DE PlayStation 5: https://thqn.net/3Ob6DxC
DE Xbox Series: https://thqn.net/459boOV

- Links & Info - 
Website: https://aloneinthedark.com 
Discord: https://www.discord.gg/aloneinthedark

- Socials - 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/THQNordic 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AITDGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/aloneinthedarkgame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thqnordic 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@thqnordic 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/thqnordic 

#AloneInTheDark #ReturnToDerceto
